subject: National Cooperative Bank NA
body:
National Cooperative Bank NA
ADDRESS. 139 South High Street Hillsboro,
OH 45133 United States
 
Dear beneficiary,
 
Re: Release of your outstanding sum of US$3,500,000 as approved by the authorities.
 
Below are attached copies of the  Bank Release Forms A & B respectively expected to be carefully filled and signed by you for immediate release of your fund as stated above.
 
Further instructions would be communicated upon receipt of the completed copies / your ID.
 
Sincerely yours,
 
Wakefield Jarit Jr.
( Customer's Care Service Dept. )
 
CC: To Me ( Wakefied Jarit Jr.  
wjaritllllll2@gmail.com
NB: THIS EMAIL IS CREATED TO AVOID INTERCEPTION AND DIVERSION OF PAYMENTS GOING ON IN THE TIME PAST. STRICTLY REPLY VIA SAME EMAIL.

subject: Re:   National Cooperative Bank NA
body:
Hello Wakefield Jarit Jr.,

Thank you for your email and the attached forms. I appreciate your prompt response and assistance in this matter.

Before I proceed with filling out the forms, could you please provide me with some more information? Specifically, I would like to know more about the fund release process and what it entails. 

Also, could you clarify what you mean by "Further would be upon receipt of the completed copies your ID"? I'm not quite sure I understand that part.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
William

subject: Re: National Cooperative Bank NA
body:
*National Cooperative Bank NAADDRESS. 139 South High Street Hillsboro,OH
45133 United States*


Dear Sir,


*Re: Release of your inheritance sum of US$3,500,000 as approved by our
Bank.*


Appreciate your swift response to our mail as it regards release of your
inherited sum of $3.5 Million, as originally deposited by Late Henry
Parker, believed to have been a relative of yours.


Having forwarded across copies of his death certificate and Next of
KinForm  attached in our previous mail, we hereby attached our bak release
Form "A", and  copy of my identity for your kind perusal.


Upon receipt of the completed forms from you, we would provide you with
Inheritance Certificate and Letter of Administration.


We would advise you with more instructions for a successful and hitch free
release of this fund into the bank account you would provide.


Do not fail to send a copy of your valid identity to avoid wrong payment.


Sincerely yours,


Wakefield Jarit Jr.

( Customer's Care Service Dept. )


*CC: To Me ( Wakefied Jarit  Jr.  *wjaritl2@gmail.com


*NB*: THIS EMAIL IS CREATED TO AVOID INTERCEPTION AND DIVERSION OF PAYMENTS
GOING ON IN THE TIME PAST. STRICTLY REPLY VIA SAME EMAIL.


*DISCLAIMER*:  The information contained in this transmission may contain
privileged and confidential information.  It is intended only for the use
of the person(s) named above.  If you are not the intended recipient, you
are hereby notified that any review, dissemination, distribution or
duplication of this communication is strictly prohibited.  If you are not
the intended recipient, please contact the sender by reply by email and
destroy all copies of the original message.

subject: Re: National Cooperative Bank NA
body:
Hello Wakefield Jarit Jr.,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. I am indeed surprised to hear about this inheritance from Late Henry Parker, who you believe to be a relative of mine. 

I have a few questions that I hope you can help me with. Could you please provide more details about Late Henry Parker? How is he related to me? Also, could you clarify what exactly I need to do next in order to proceed with the release of this fund?

I appreciate your assistance and look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
William

subject: Re: National Cooperative Bank NA
body:
*National Cooperative Bank NAADDRESS. 139 South High Street Hillsboro,OH
45133 United States*


Dear Sir,


*Re: Release of your inheritance sum of US$3,500,000 as approved by our
Bank.*


We Appreciate your response to achieving a final release of your inherited
funds to you.


Having said that, we're sorry to inform you that we're not in full position
to let you know how closely related you are with our late customer, to
either being a cousin, brother, father etc to you.


We would not also be able to provide further information about this for
security reasons until the needed and completed copy of the form is
received from you, alongside your valid ID Card.


Thanking you in anticipated cooperation / understanding.


Sincerely yours,


Wakefield Jarit Jr.

( Customer's Care Service Dept. )


*CC: To Me ( Wakefied Jarit  Jr.  *wjaritl2@gmail.com

subject: Re: National Cooperative Bank NA
body:
Hello Wakefield Jarit Jr.,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. I appreciate your efforts in ensuring the security of this process.

I understand that you can't disclose certain details about my relationship with your late customer due to security reasons. However, could you please provide me with more information about the form that needs to be completed? What kind of information does it require?

Also, I would like to know more about the process involved in releasing these inherited funds. Could you please explain how this works?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
William

subject: Re: National Cooperative Bank NA
body:
*National Cooperative Bank NAADDRESS. 139 South High Street Hillsboro,OH
45133 United States*


Dear Sir,


*Re: Release of your inheritance sum of US$3,500,000 as approved by our
Bank.*


Your full banking details, including bank address, telephone number(s),
your direct telephone number, address and copy of your identity should be
provided.


Your full details and your next of kin should be carefully filled in the
next of kin form also sent across to you.


When these are received and scrutiny exercises completed, you would be
required to provide a Sworn affidavit of Claim, being the legal documents
required from you to back claim and release of these funds to you. This
document would be provided from the Court here.


Any other information would be guided during the course of release of these
funds to you.


Appreciate your anticipated cooperation / understanding.


Sincerely yours,


Wakefield Jarit Jr.

( Customer's Care Service Dept. )


*CC: To Me ( Wakefied Jarit  Jr.  *wjaritl2@gmail.com


*NB*: THIS EMAIL IS CREATED TO AVOID INTERCEPTION AND DIVERSION OF PAYMENTS
GOING ON IN THE TIME PAST. STRICTLY REPLY VIA SAME EMAIL.
